option.name: originalContent
updatedContent
originalContent
updatedContent
originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:id="@+id/main_account" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="#F8F9FA">
<!-- Modern Header with Gradient --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/header" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="200dp" android:orientation="vertical" android:background="@drawable/modern_header_gradient" android:gravity="center" android:elevation="8dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent">
<ImageView android:layout_width="36dp" android:layout_height="36dp" android:src="@drawable/baseline_manage_accounts_24" android:contentDescription="Account Icon" app:tint="#FFFFFF" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp"/>
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Tài khoản" android:textColor="#FFFFFF" android:textSize="24sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:letterSpacing="0.02"/>
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Quản lý thông tin cá nhân" android:textColor="#E8F5E9" android:textSize="13sp" android:layout_marginTop="4dp"/> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Profile Card --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:id="@+id/accountInfo" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="24dp" android:layout_marginEnd="24dp" android:layout_marginTop="-60dp" app:cardCornerRadius="20dp" app:cardElevation="8dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="#FFFFFF" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/header" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="20dp" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:cardCornerRadius="35dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/profileImageView" android:layout_width="70dp" android:layout_height="70dp" android:src="@drawable/avatar" android:contentDescription="Avatar Image" android:scaleType="centerCrop"/> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<TextView android:id="@+id/profileUsername" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="#212121" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:layout_gravity="center_vertical" />
<ImageView android:id="@+id/logoutBtn" android:layout_width="40dp" android:layout_height="40dp" android:src="@drawable/baseline_logout_24" android:contentDescription="Logout Icon" android:background="@drawable/circle_background" android:backgroundTint="#FFEBEE" android:padding="8dp" app:tint="#F44336" android:layout_gravity="center_vertical" /> </LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<ScrollView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="0dp" android:layout_marginTop="24dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/accountInfo" app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@id/bottomNavigation" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" android:paddingHorizontal="16dp" android:clipToPadding="false" android:scrollbarStyle="outsideOverlay">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:paddingBottom="16dp">
<!-- Account Settings Section Header --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Thiết lập tài khoản" android:textStyle="bold" android:textSize="16sp" android:paddingVertical="12dp" android:paddingHorizontal="4dp" android:textColor="#212121" android:letterSpacing="0.02"/>
<!-- Account Settings Card --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="#FFFFFF" android:layout_marginBottom="20dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="8dp">
<LinearLayout android:id="@+id/changeInfo" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="16dp" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:background="?android:attr/selectableItemBackground">
<ImageView android:layout_width="24dp" android:layout_height="24dp" android:src="@drawable/baseline_manage_accounts_24" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" app:tint="#4CAF50"/>
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Chỉnh sửa thông tin" android:textSize="15sp" android:textColor="#212121"/>
<ImageView android:layout_width="20dp" android:layout_height="20dp" android:src="@drawable/icon_arrow" app:tint="#BDBDBD"/> </LinearLayout>
<View android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="1dp" android:background="#F0F0F0" android:layout_marginHorizontal="16dp"/>
<LinearLayout android:id="@+id/changePassword" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="16dp" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:background="?android:attr/selectableItemBackground">
<ImageView android:layout_width="24dp" android:layout_height="24dp" android:src="@drawable/baseline_manage_accounts_24" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" app:tint="#2196F3"/>
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Thay đổi mật khẩu" android:textSize="15sp" android:textColor="#212121"/>
<ImageView android:layout_width="20dp" android:layout_height="20dp" android:src="@drawable/icon_arrow" app:tint="#BDBDBD"/> </LinearLayout>
<View android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="1dp" android:background="#F0F0F0" android:layout_marginHorizontal="16dp"/>
<LinearLayout android:id="@+id/tvNotificationSettings" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="16dp" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<ImageView android:layout_width="24dp" android:layout_height="24dp" android:src="@drawable/baseline_notifications_none_24" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" app:tint="#FF9800"/>
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvNotificationLabel" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Bật thông báo" android:textSize="15sp" android:textColor="#212121"/>
<Switch android:id="@+id/switchNotification" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:contentDescription="Bật thông báo" tools:ignore="UseSwitchCompatOrMaterialXml" /> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<!-- Additional Info Section Header --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Thông tin thêm" android:textStyle="bold" android:textSize="16sp" android:paddingVertical="12dp" android:paddingHorizontal="4dp" android:textColor="#212121" android:letterSpacing="0.02"/>
<!-- Additional Info Card --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="#FFFFFF">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="8dp">
<LinearLayout android:id="@+id/tvAbout" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="16dp" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:background="?android:attr/selectableItemBackground">
<ImageView android:layout_width="24dp" android:layout_height="24dp" android:src="@drawable/baseline_home_24" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" app:tint="#9C27B0"/>
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Về chúng tôi" android:textSize="15sp" android:textColor="#212121"/>
<ImageView android:layout_width="20dp" android:layout_height="20dp" android:src="@drawable/icon_arrow" app:tint="#BDBDBD"/> </LinearLayout>
<View android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="1dp" android:background="#F0F0F0" android:layout_marginHorizontal="16dp"/>
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="16dp" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:background="?android:attr/selectableItemBackground">
<ImageView android:layout_width="24dp" android:layout_height="24dp" android:src="@drawable/baseline_sticky_note_2_24" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" app:tint="#00BCD4"/>
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Chính sách bảo mật" android:textSize="15sp" android:textColor="#212121"/>
<ImageView android:layout_width="20dp" android:layout_height="20dp" android:src="@drawable/icon_arrow" app:tint="#BDBDBD"/> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView> </LinearLayout> </ScrollView>
<include android:id="@+id/bottomNavigation" layout="@layout/activity_bottom_nav_base" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" android:visibility="gone" />
<include android:id="@+id/bottomNavigationDriver" layout="@layout/activity_buttom_nav_drivers" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" android:visibility="gone" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

option.name: updatedContent

<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:paddingBottom="16dp">
<!-- Account Settings Section Header --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Thiết lập tài khoản" android:textStyle="bold" android:textSize="16sp" android:paddingVertical="12dp" android:paddingHorizontal="4dp" android:textColor="#212121" android:letterSpacing="0.02"/>
<!-- Account Settings Card --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="#FFFFFF" android:layout_marginBottom="20dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="8dp">
<LinearLayout android:id="@+id/changeInfo" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="16dp" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:background="?android:attr/selectableItemBackground">

<ImageView android:layout_width="20dp" android:layout_height="20dp" android:src="@drawable/icon_arrow" app:tint="#BDBDBD"/> </LinearLayout>

<!-- Additional Info Section Header --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Thông tin thêm" android:textStyle="bold" android:textSize="16sp" android:paddingVertical="12dp" android:paddingHorizontal="4dp" android:textColor="#212121" android:letterSpacing="0.02"/>
<!-- Additional Info Card --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="#FFFFFF">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="8dp">
<LinearLayout android:id="@+id/tvAbout" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="16dp" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:background="?android:attr/selectableItemBackground">
<ImageView android:layout_width="24dp" android:layout_height="24dp" android:src="@drawable/baseline_home_24" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" app:tint="#9C27B0"/>
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Về chúng tôi" android:textSize="15sp" android:textColor="#212121"/>
<ImageView android:layout_width="20dp" android:layout_height="20dp" android:src="@drawable/icon_arrow" app:tint="#BDBDBD"/> </LinearLayout>
<View android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="1dp" android:background="#F0F0F0" android:layout_marginHorizontal="16dp"/>
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="16dp" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:background="?android:attr/selectableItemBackground">
<ImageView android:layout_width="24dp" android:layout_height="24dp" android:src="@drawable/baseline_sticky_note_2_24" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" app:tint="#00BCD4"/>
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Chính sách bảo mật" android:textSize="15sp" android:textColor="#212121"/>
<ImageView android:layout_width="20dp" android:layout_height="20dp" android:src="@drawable/icon_arrow" app:tint="#BDBDBD"/> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView> </LinearLayout> </ScrollView>

</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <RelativeLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:id="@+id/main" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="#F8F9FA" tools:context=".view.clients.OrderActivity">
<!-- Modern Header --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/modern_header" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@drawable/modern_header_gradient" android:orientation="vertical" android:paddingTop="16dp" android:paddingBottom="24dp" android:elevation="8dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="center" android:text="Quản lý chuyến đi" android:textColor="#FFFFFF" android:textSize="24sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:letterSpacing="0.02"/>
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="center" android:text="Theo dõi và quản lý các chuyến đi của bạn" android:textColor="#E8F5E9" android:textSize="13sp" android:layout_marginTop="4dp"/> </LinearLayout>
<!-- TabHost --> <TabHost android:id="@+id/TabOrderState" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:layout_below="@id/modern_header" android:layout_above="@id/bottomNavigation" android:layout_marginTop="8dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical">
<!-- TabWidget with Modern Design --> <TabWidget android:id="@android:id/tabs" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@android:color/transparent" android:padding="12dp" android:elevation="0dp" />
<!-- Tab Content --> <FrameLayout android:id="@android:id/tabcontent" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:padding="16dp">
<!-- Tab 1: Current Orders --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/tab1" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical" android:background="@android:color/transparent" android:padding="16dp">
<androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="#FFFFFF">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="16dp" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<ImageView android:layout_width="40dp" android:layout_height="40dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_current_order" android:background="@drawable/circle_background" android:backgroundTint="#E8F5E9" android:padding="8dp" app:tint="#4CAF50"/>
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_marginStart="16dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Chuyến đi hiện tại" android:textColor="#212121" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold"/>
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Các chuyến đang thực hiện" android:textColor="#757575" android:textSize="13sp" android:layout_marginTop="2dp"/> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<ListView android:id="@+id/lvCurrentOrder" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:divider="@android:color/transparent" android:dividerHeight="8dp" android:background="@null" android:clipToPadding="false" android:scrollbarStyle="outsideOverlay" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Tab 2: Completed Orders --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/tab2" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical" android:background="@android:color/transparent" android:padding="16dp">
<androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="#FFFFFF">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="16dp" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<ImageView android:layout_width="40dp" android:layout_height="40dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_complete_order" android:background="@drawable/circle_background" android:backgroundTint="#E3F2FD" android:padding="8dp" app:tint="#2196F3"/>
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_marginStart="16dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Chuyến đi đã hoàn thành" android:textColor="#212121" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold"/>
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Lịch sử các chuyến đi thành công" android:textColor="#757575" android:textSize="13sp" android:layout_marginTop="2dp"/> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<ListView android:id="@+id/lvCompleteOrder" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:divider="@android:color/transparent" android:dividerHeight="8dp" android:background="@null" android:clipToPadding="false" android:scrollbarStyle="outsideOverlay" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Tab 3: Canceled Orders --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/tab3" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical" android:background="@android:color/transparent" android:padding="16dp">
<androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="#FFFFFF">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="16dp" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<ImageView android:layout_width="40dp" android:layout_height="40dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_cancel_order" android:background="@drawable/circle_background" android:backgroundTint="#FFEBEE" android:padding="8dp" app:tint="#F44336"/>
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_marginStart="16dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Chuyến đi đã hủy" android:textColor="#212121" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold"/>
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Các chuyến đi đã bị hủy bỏ" android:textColor="#757575" android:textSize="13sp" android:layout_marginTop="2dp"/> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<ListView android:id="@+id/lvCancelOrder" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:divider="@android:color/transparent" android:dividerHeight="8dp" android:background="@null" android:clipToPadding="false" android:scrollbarStyle="outsideOverlay" /> </LinearLayout> </FrameLayout> </LinearLayout> </TabHost>
<!-- Bottom Navigation --> <include android:id="@+id/bottomNavigation" layout="@layout/activity_bottom_nav_base" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_alignParentBottom="true" /> </RelativeLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <RelativeLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:id="@+id/main" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="#F8F9FA" tools:context=".view.clients.OrderActivity">
<!-- Modern Header --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/modern_header" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@drawable/modern_header_gradient" android:orientation="vertical" android:paddingTop="20dp" android:paddingBottom="32dp" android:elevation="8dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="center" android:text="Quản lý chuyến đi" android:textColor="#FFFFFF" android:textSize="24sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:letterSpacing="0.02"/>
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="center" android:text="Theo dõi và quản lý các chuyến đi của bạn" android:textColor="#E3F2FD" android:textSize="13sp" android:layout_marginTop="4dp"/> </LinearLayout>
<!-- TabHost --> <TabHost android:id="@+id/TabOrderState" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:layout_below="@id/modern_header" android:layout_above="@id/bottomNavigation" android:layout_marginTop="8dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical">
<!-- TabWidget with Modern Design --> <TabWidget android:id="@android:id/tabs" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@android:color/transparent" android:padding="12dp" android:elevation="0dp" />
<!-- Tab Content --> <FrameLayout android:id="@android:id/tabcontent" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:padding="16dp">
<!-- Tab 1: Current Orders --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/tab1" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical" android:background="@android:color/transparent" android:padding="16dp">
<androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="#FFFFFF">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="16dp" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<ImageView android:layout_width="40dp" android:layout_height="40dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_current_order" android:background="@drawable/circle_background" android:backgroundTint="#E8F5E9" android:padding="8dp" app:tint="#4CAF50"/>
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_marginStart="16dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Chuyến đi hiện tại" android:textColor="#212121" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold"/>
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Các chuyến đang thực hiện" android:textColor="#757575" android:textSize="13sp" android:layout_marginTop="2dp"/> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<ListView android:id="@+id/lvCurrentOrder" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:divider="@android:color/transparent" android:dividerHeight="8dp" android:background="@null" android:clipToPadding="false" android:scrollbarStyle="outsideOverlay" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Tab 2: Completed Orders --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/tab2" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical" android:background="@android:color/transparent" android:padding="16dp">
<androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="#FFFFFF">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="16dp" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<ImageView android:layout_width="40dp" android:layout_height="40dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_complete_order" android:background="@drawable/circle_background" android:backgroundTint="#E3F2FD" android:padding="8dp" app:tint="#2196F3"/>
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_marginStart="16dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Chuyến đi đã hoàn thành" android:textColor="#212121" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold"/>
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Lịch sử các chuyến đi thành công" android:textColor="#757575" android:textSize="13sp" android:layout_marginTop="2dp"/> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<ListView android:id="@+id/lvCompleteOrder" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:divider="@android:color/transparent" android:dividerHeight="8dp" android:background="@null" android:clipToPadding="false" android:scrollbarStyle="outsideOverlay" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Tab 3: Canceled Orders --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/tab3" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical" android:background="@android:color/transparent" android:padding="16dp">
<androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="#FFFFFF">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="16dp" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<ImageView android:layout_width="40dp" android:layout_height="40dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_cancel_order" android:background="@drawable/circle_background" android:backgroundTint="#E0E0E0" android:padding="8dp" app:tint="#757575"/>
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_marginStart="16dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Chuyến đi đã hủy" android:textColor="#212121" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold"/>
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Các chuyến đi đã bị hủy bỏ" android:textColor="#757575" android:textSize="13sp" android:layout_marginTop="2dp"/> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<ListView android:id="@+id/lvCancelOrder" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:divider="@android:color/transparent" android:dividerHeight="8dp" android:background="@null" android:clipToPadding="false" android:scrollbarStyle="outsideOverlay" /> </LinearLayout> </FrameLayout> </LinearLayout> </TabHost>
<!-- Bottom Navigation --> <include android:id="@+id/bottomNavigation" layout="@layout/activity_bottom_nav_base" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_alignParentBottom="true" /> </RelativeLayout>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginHorizontal="4dp" android:layout_marginVertical="4dp" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="3dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="#FFFFFF">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp">
<!-- Departure Section --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:paddingBottom="8dp">
<ImageView android:layout_width="24dp" android:layout_height="24dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_location_pin" android:layout_marginEnd="12dp" app:tint="#4CAF50"/>
<TextView android:id="@+id/txtDepature" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Pick Up: Quang Ninh" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="#212121"/> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Destination Section --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:paddingBottom="12dp">
<ImageView android:layout_width="24dp" android:layout_height="24dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_destination" android:layout_marginEnd="12dp" app:tint="#F44336"/>
<TextView android:id="@+id/txtDestination" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Destination: Ha Noi" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="#212121"/> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Divider --> <View android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="1dp" android:background="#F0F0F0" android:layout_marginBottom="12dp"/>
<!-- Date Layout --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<ImageView android:layout_width="18dp" android:layout_height="18dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_calendar" android:layout_marginEnd="8dp" app:tint="#2196F3"/>
<TextView android:id="@+id/txtDepatureDate" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="20/12/2003" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="#757575"/> </LinearLayout>
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<ImageView android:layout_width="18dp" android:layout_height="18dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_calendar" android:layout_marginEnd="8dp" app:tint="#FF9800"/>
<TextView android:id="@+id/txtReturnDate" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="20/12/2003" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="#757575"/> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>
</androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginHorizontal="4dp" android:layout_marginVertical="4dp" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="3dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="#FFFFFF">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp">
<!-- Departure Section --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:paddingBottom="8dp">
<ImageView android:layout_width="24dp" android:layout_height="24dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_location_pin" android:layout_marginEnd="12dp" app:tint="#2196F3"/>
<TextView android:id="@+id/txtDepature" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Pick Up: Quang Ninh" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="#212121"/> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Destination Section --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:paddingBottom="12dp">
<ImageView android:layout_width="24dp" android:layout_height="24dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_destination" android:layout_marginEnd="12dp" app:tint="#1976D2"/>
<TextView android:id="@+id/txtDestination" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Destination: Ha Noi" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="#212121"/> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Divider --> <View android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="1dp" android:background="#F0F0F0" android:layout_marginBottom="12dp"/>
<!-- Departure Date --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<ImageView android:layout_width="18dp" android:layout_height="18dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_calendar" android:layout_marginEnd="8dp" app:tint="#2196F3"/>
<TextView android:id="@+id/txtDepatureDate" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="20/12/2003" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="#757575"/> </LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>
</androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
